channel.title: My New comp wont upload pics? why?
channel.description:
Like normal i do this:
[code][img]http://img511.imageshack.us/my.php?image=fdfvc3.png[/img][/code]
if i want an image now all it comes up with is this: [img]http://img511.imageshack.us/my.php?image=fdfvc3.png[/img] why is this

item.title: My New comp wont upload pics? why?
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

omfg people,

answer= upload the photo on photobucket. then copy the link in that [img] and it will appear.

Read full topic

item.source: My New comp wont upload pics? why?

item.title: My New comp wont upload pics? why?
item.dc:creator: @Due_Pwn Due Pwn
item.description:
@Due_Pwn wrote:

This usually isn’t your computer.

This could be moparscape BLOCKING the feature of hosting a picture in this certain section of the forums. Try uploading this into your signature or into a different thread.

EDIT: I know what you did wrong.
When you use ImageShack, and you want to host your pic, you use the “Direct link to image” URL and not the “Show image to friends” URL.

Read full topic
item.source: My New comp wont upload pics? why?
